long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Designed to work in conjunction with AppGate's Compliance Sheriff®, Compliance Deputy is an on-demand browser-based solution that allows developers and content providers to test and repair content prior to publishing in the production environment. It leverages the checkpoints and rules designed in Compliance Sheriff to test page content as it’s being created to ensure only compliant content is published to live sites. Address Web governance issues including privacy factors like personally identifiable information (PII) and protected health information (PHI), Web accessibility, site quality, offensive content and more. Compliance Deputy is a browser-based application, making it simple to roll-out to a large number of content developers.
